name: The Day I Died (itch) (Deps)
description:
Controls: WASD to move, E to pick up foodstuff from vending machines. E to give it to a neuron.

An idea was born. Plans were made. A course was set.

Then it all came crashing down.

You are the last single molecule of serotonin left, and you need to keep the last three neurons alive, or else the idea will die, the plans will fail, and the course will end up in the black darkness of the void.

No pressure!

But keep feeding the neurons!!
